Text: Apologies gents for the mess around, been having a few technical issues.
where can i download the full game?

@themilflover

What are you talking about? I downloaded this just fine and it works perfectly well. All the scenarios load, no faults at all. Good upload, thanks for this.
How do you install this? I have moved Assets, Contents and Manuals into the correct folder and it's not game

I copied as normal and it installed 100%. What i did i ran Railworks went to drive train and selected 444, i had to complete the tutorial befor it unlocked other scenarios.

Assets into Assets folder etc..

Hope this helps?
Thanks for the download - only tried the tutorial so far.

can't get career scenario "Short Form-CS" to work,error with "tracks.bin",but the standard Short Form work okay and all other scenarios work like charm..I guess its time we need Portsmouth Direct Line optimized/updated for RW3,the one on tpb is old RW2 version...btw I also managed to run all acela+genesis standard and career scenarios with the latest updated NEC RW3 optimized,as expected,fps runs fucking slow..50 going down to like 10fps =(
